name: The Packt: Treacherous Bloodline
description:
The Packt is an alliance between werewolves that ensured the survival and secrecy of their species since their arrival on earth and prevented the human world from succumbing to the Demons. Now, someone is opening a giant Portal that could lead to a Demon invasion, and word of the streets is that the responsible is one of the six clans that founded the Packt. Six pact members were sent on a mission to close the Portal, will they be able to reach and close the Portal in time, or will the traitors achieve their secret goal?

Development team
  • Alessandro Savona (Programmer) 
  • Daniele Fiorenza (Designer) 
  • Federico Locatelli (Programmer)
